channel.title: brand on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in brand on SoftLayer API

item.title: Working with Brands
item.description: A Brand account is a special type of account at SoftLayer that allows the owner to manage sub-accounts. These sub accounts are separate and individual like any other SoftLayer account, with the exception being that the Brand Master account has access to them. For these examples, all API calls will be made by a user under the brand master account. Owned Brands To use the SoftLayer_Brand you first need to find out the BrandId that the account owns.

item.title: Get top level billing items for all owned accounts
item.description: With a given date range, get all the invoice details for all of the owned brands, and all of their owned accounts. The $filter can be used to get just a single accounts invoices, just take off the ->allOwnedAccounts bits <?php require_once __DIR__.'/vendor/autoload.php'; /** * This class structure is mostly used so this can be run as a script. * Most of the print statements use fancy bash color codes to make things pretty */ class topBillingItems { function __construct() { $this->apiUsername = ''; $this->apiKey = ''; $this->startDate = new DateTime('2015-02-12T00:00:00', new DateTimeZone('CST')); $this->endDate = new DateTime('2015-03-12T00:00:00', new DateTimeZone('CST')); } /*!
